page.title: 05Moredon Nurseries
page.content: {Moredon Nurseries}supply plants for parks,roundabouts and other public places in Thamesdown.To get the beautiful flowers they have to buy the seeds from Colgraves.They specialize in{daffodils}and every year they plant more.Every year they plant 220,000 bedding plants.They plant more {geraniums}than any other bedding plant.They look after 100,000 {trees.}The tree they plant the most is the Mountain Ash.They make 120 hanging baskets per summer. Eleven people work at the nurseries.There are 4 trainees,a foreman,2 greenhouse technicians,a decorator and 3 outside workers.The nurseries cover 14 acres of land and there is half an acre of greenhouses.The people of Thamesdown are very lucky to have such beautiful flowers in their town.
